content.title: Listen to music
content.description: I love music. And this music is metal. Great is not the one who imitates. Great is the one who creates!

content.title: Bike
content.description: Due to my cerebral palsy parents were afraid to teach me how to ride the bicycle. So I first try it when I was 30. I find it a very nice activity for my free time.

content.title: Chess
content.description: If you want to play with me, click on the link below

content.title: Drums
content.description: When I was 16, I started to listen to rock music, and I had a dream to play drums. I did everything to fulfill it. (Sorry neighbors :) )

content.title: Video Games
content.description: My favorite genre is the horror with a good story as a basis. Also play strategies and logical games.

content.title: Traveling
content.description: I love to take a long walk in the nature. By the way, Latvia has a couple of really nice places. For example: The Big Bog of Kemery. Or the place you see in this photo. Can you guess where it is taken? ;)

content.title: Reading books
content.description: Mostly into horror. But I also love popular science and of course clever IT books.
